definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else

sentences.english: My father beat me for answering him back.
sentences.chinese: 我父親因我還嘴而打我。

sentences.english: Don't talk back when I'm speaking to you.
sentences.chinese: 我和你說話的時候不要還嘴。

sentences.english: The child would answer back to all she said.
sentences.chinese: 她說什麼這孩子都要還嘴。

sentences.english: Don't you talk back to me or I'll hit you.
